extension.name: Enforce Sender Domain
extension.description: This extension rewrites the From: and Reply-To: headers for any outgoing email that is set to use a From: address that does not comply with the email pattern configured in this extension. It is useful for helping maintain email reputation, and in some cases necessary to ensure mail delivery (eg. when using Amazon's Simple Email Service for SMTP).
extension.comments: This module is under active development and still very much alpha quality code. Use at your own risk.
